contents.name: I,Philip
contents.description: 23 years after Philip K. Dick‚Äôs death, in 2005, David Hanson, a young engineer in robotics, revealed his first android with human form, ‚ÄúPhil‚Äù.

descriptionArray.de: 23 Jahre nach dem Tod von Philip K. Dick im Jahr 2005 pr√§sentiert der Robotik-Designer David Hanson seinen ersten menschlichen Androiden, ‚ÄûPhil‚Äú.‚ÄûI, Philip‚Äú erz√§hlt aus der subjektiven Perspektive von Phil, wie dieser Menschen begegnet, mit ihnen spricht und sich an eine Liebesgeschichte erinnert. Handelt es sich hierbei um eine Erinnerung aus dem Leben des echten Philip K. Dick?

descriptionArray.en: 23 years after Philip K. Dick‚Äôs death, in 2005, David Hanson, a young engineer in robotics, revealed his first android with human form, ‚ÄúPhil‚Äù. ‚ÄùI Philip‚Äù immerses you in the memories of what could be the last love affair of the writer. But aren‚Äôt these memories the fruit of the imagination of an android which learned, little by little, how to become a human?

contents.name: Rapzember
contents.description: 25 hours under the sign of Rap - that's Rapzember on Fritz.  The video shows an interview with the musician Young Hurn in the studio of the radio station.

descriptionArray.en: 25 hours under the sign of Rap - that's Rapzember on Fritz.  The video shows an interview with the musician Young Hurn in the studio of the radio station.
